answers.answer: check the symptoms of fibromyalgia or Chronic fatigue syndrome

question: Im an 18 year old female and for the past few years since i was 13/14 i have been experiencing so many worrying symptoms.-shooting nerve pains in legs which make legs go weak.-headaches-blurred vision-stabbing pains in arms, legs, neck, hands and feet-tingling in hands and feet-pain behind eyes-muscle twitches and fasciculations-abdominal problems which are like IBS- painful jaw joint which sometimes clicks and is painfuland many more!!Im so scared that i have some neurological/neuromuscular or autoimmune disorder! I have had numerous blood tests done, negative for rheumatoid arthritis and diabetes. The only thing which came back abnormal was a low b12 of 203. Ive had 6 b12 injections and i felt a bit better for about a week but now the symptoms are back worse than ever. Please help me im so scared that there is something seriously/fatally wrong with me.
title: Could this be some neurological disease?
